message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be a valuable asset to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,000,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to act quickly.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $1,000,000 is unfortunately above my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than your offer. I'm willing to come down to $950,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $950,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us. How about $900,000? I'm serious about acquiring this product and believe this price is fair considering its value to me.
